definition: full moon/to hope/to expect/to visit/to gaze (into the distance)/to look towards/towards
15th day of month (lunar calendar)/old variant of 望[wang4]
to stand a good chance/to have great hopes/to be promising
It is better to travel hopefully than to arrive.
pinyin: dai4 zhe5 xi1 wang4 qu4 lu:3 xing2 , bi3 dao4 da2 zhong1 dian3 geng4 mei3 hao3
containing_words.word: 带着希望去旅行，比到达终点更美好

definition: outsider (i.e. not expected to win a race or championship)
pinyin: wu2 qu3 sheng4 xi1 wang4 zhe3

sentences.english: I hope he can see the movie next time.
sentences.chinese: 我希望他下回能看这部影片。

sentences.english: I hope to be available for the Coppa Italia match against Udinese. I remain confident.
sentences.chinese: 希望在意大利杯对阵乌迪内斯的比赛时我能复出吧。

sentences.english: This is the color of hopefulness, and of our connection to nature.
sentences.chinese: 这种颜色代表着希望，以及我们和自然的关联。

sentences.english: I want players to enjoy the 'aha!' of solving a puzzle.
sentences.chinese: 我希望玩家能享受解决一个谜题后“啊哈”的感觉。

sentences.english: Beaverton's % Mayor Doyle wants refugee and immigrant leaders to participate in the town's decision-making.
sentences.chinese: 比弗顿市长道尔希望难民和移民领袖参与本市的决策。

sentences.english: I hope I don't need it, because I don't even know how to load it.
sentences.chinese: 我希望我并不需要它，因为我还不知道怎么装子弹呢。

sentences.english: They want Beijing out of the World Trade Organization.
sentences.chinese: 他们希望中国脱离世界贸易组织。

sentences.english: We do not want to face US pressures on our own.
sentences.chinese: 我们不希望独自承受来自美国的压力。

sentences.english: Only humping yourself can you hope to finish your work in time.
sentences.chinese: 只有加把劲干，你才有希望按时完成任务。

sentences.english: I hope that these 17 tips will help you find a way out of grumpiness.
sentences.chinese: 我希望这17个办法可以帮助你脱离暴躁的情绪。

sentences.english: Chandler wants Monica to wear the earings he gave her.
sentences.chinese: 钱德希望莫妮卡戴上他送的耳环。

sentences.english: Kitten urgent need, hope in two days after double.
sentences.chinese: 小猫急用，希望在两天内翻完。

sentences.english: The Indians know full well that China expects obedience from its neighbors.
sentences.chinese: 印度人清楚地知道，中国希望其邻国乖乖地服从领导。

sentences.english: Hope that the United States will abandon the Cold War mentality, not in Hongkong to engage in political gamesmanship.
sentences.chinese: 希望美方摒弃冷战思维，不在香港搞政治上的小动作。

sentences.english: We would like to get rid of x because it is this dependent variable.
sentences.chinese: 我们希望摆脱x，因为x是一个因变量。

sentences.english: There was a time when every moment was infused with hope and wonder.
sentences.chinese: 生命中曾有段时期充满著希望和惊喜。

definition: to be capable of/to be able to/can
to think/to believe/to suppose/to wish/to want/to miss (feel wistful about the absence of sb or sth)
to fight for/to strive for/to win over
can/to be able to/might possibly/ability/(physics) energy
hope and expectation/to anticipate/to look forward to/to await expectantly
to call on (sb to do sth)/to appeal (to)/an appeal
to yield/to permit/to let sb do sth/to have sb do sth/to make sb (feel sad etc)/by (indicates the agent in a passive clause, like 被[bei4])
to express/to show/to say/to state/to indicate/to mean
also/too/(in Classical Chinese) final particle implying affirmation
